description: The ZBFX file is used by all of the zebNet backup programs to store backup data. The zebNet backup programs for web browsers include Backup for Chrome, Backup for Firefox, Backup for Internet Explorer (discontinued), Backup for Opera Browser, and Backup for SeaMonkey.

The zebNet backup programs for email clients include Backup for Outlook, Backup for Thunderbird, Backup for eM Client, Backup for Opera Mail, Backup for SeaMonkey, Backup for Postbox, Backup for Live Mail (discontinued), and Backup for IncrediMail.
